thread.title: Jeethu Joseph to shoot Prithviraj film in December
thread.title_full: Jeethu Joseph to shoot Prithviraj film in December - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Jeethu Joseph to shoot Prithviraj film in December
text:
Jeethu Joseph is all set to collaborate with Prithviraj for his next and is busy finishing the script of the movie. The Drishyam director, who had earlier worked with the superstar for Memories, tells us that the movie will go on floors by the end of this year.
"We are hoping to start shoot by December," says Jeethu, about the action film. The rest of the cast of the movie is yet to be decided.
Jeethu's last release was Life of Josutty , which had Dileep in the lead. The movie had a lukewarm reception at the box office, when compared to the blockbuster Drishyam , which was remade in Tamil, Kannada, Telugu and Hindi.
